item.title: nginxでport:443を受け付け、port:80のhttpdへ、リバースプロキシしたい
item.description: nginx server { listen 80; server_name www.site.com; return 301 https://$host$request_uri; } server { ssl on; listen 443; server_name www.site.com; ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/www.site.com/fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/www.site.com/privkey.pem; include /etc/nginx/default.d/*.conf; location / { proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8080; proxy_redirect off; proxy_set_header Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Host $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Server $host; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; } } ssl化にはlets encyptを使用して
